Reviews.Title: “Great hotel for stopovers”
Reviews.Author: LiverpoolElaineS
Reviews.Content: stayed enroute india uk stayed offer value money reflects price paid located short distance airport welcoming staff helpful hotel beautifully decorated arab style located quiet street near mosque close deira city shopping pleasant reasonably priced restaurants modern comfortable lovely bathroom absolute luxury trip india aircon mechanic minutes fix stayed night didnt restaurant recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Nice, cozy place to stay in Dubai”

Reviews.Content: stayed al 4 days pilgrimage egypt welcome respite tiring enjoyable journey clean comfy buffet breakfast served wide variety staff veery helpful overal stay hotel pleasant recommend

Reviews.Content: dubai family business stay neat clean importantly free alcohol mosque front hotel deira city center 3 mins walking distance free wifi staff extremely courteous staying past 7 plan 7

Reviews.Title: “Comfy stay, Nice rooms, close to airport - Good Value”
Reviews.Author: RayMamon
Reviews.Content: landed 2 am dubai time past 3 morning short taxi ride 25 dh dxb check snap passport returned 7th floor neat clean coffee tea maker mini bar bathrooms clean kept avoid breakfast buffet 50 dh instead walk 5 min diera city center nice buffet 20 dh converted currency instead airport quiet night clubs pretty family hotel advertised staff helpful courteous 4 hotel paid 2 day stay inclusive 20 taxes

Reviews.Title: “Beware!!! Worst hotel ever!!! Illeterate stafff!!!!”

Reviews.Content: business trip dubai time unfortunately company booked hotel hotel staff illiterate met girl conference join dinner explorer dubai waiting lobby told wait till freshen 510 minutes stupid people knocked door screaming security moment door egyptian guys started started yelling told call police coz lady stunned behavior replied politely visitor leaving hotel 5 mins wait outside till lady beware hotel
